member.name: M:System.Collections.HashHelpers.GetFastModMultiplier(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns approximate reciprocal of the divisor: ceil(2**64 / divisor).
member.remarks: This should only be used on 64-bit.

member.name: M:System.Collections.HashHelpers.FastMod(System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Performs a mod operation using the multiplier pre-computed with .
member.remarks: This should only be used on 64-bit.

member.name: P:System.SR.Arg_HTCapacityOverflow
member.summary: Hashtable's capacity overflowed and went negative. Check load factor, capacity and the current size of the table.

member.name: P:System.SR.Reflection_Disabled
member.summary: This operation is not available because the reflection support was disabled at compile time.
